thread.title: CARPENTIERI, C R
thread.title_full: WholeLatteLove.com reviewed by CARPENTIERI, C R

author: CARPENTIERI, C R
title: CARPENTIERI, C R
text: You are unlikely to find better customer service anywhere. Over the past 10 years I have purchased 2 espresso machines, 2 coffee grinders and all sorts of accessories. When my 10 year old machine needs maintenance or repair, WholeLatteLove is right there with their own service techs who know the machines and can instruct you on making repairs. They also stock all of the parts for the machines. In the event of an unusual or intractable problem, the owner himself will jump in and solve the problem. Please buy your coffee appliances and beans from them.
